title: Introducing: Jeshi
body:
London’s **Jeshi** showcases a pretty sinister side on his debut EP, Pussy Palace.

Drawing from the likes of Mick Jenkins, Rejjie Snow, tracks like Delphine and 2Tashly are littered with slightly ominous suggestions yet are perfectly put together and undoubtedly intriguing. Check out a couple of highlights below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
